AOP.description: The planed Area of Patrol for the server

Timestamp.description:
When should the RP start. Accepts Unix Timestamps and relative times.
Relative: days:hours:minutes (Ex. 1:12:30 = 1 day, 12 hours, 30 minutes) or just minutes (Ex. 30 = 30 minutes)

Ping.description: Ping the server when you submit the form

Training.description: Will training be happening during this RP

Ping At RP Time.description: Should the server be pinged at the RP time
